location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Ajmere [Ajmer] to Mrs Caroline Janet Sybella Shuttleworth

mods.abstract: Letter thanking her for her note and asking her to thank her husband for the ice.The letter goes on to discuss the coincidence of the Shuttleworths receiving a letter from Government regarding Mayo College on the same day that Pelly had submitted his name.
